name: Thai Spicy Catfish Recipe With Red Curry Paste
description: Crispy, deep-fried catfish chunks tossed in a hot red curry paste that's bursting with bold flavors!

itemListElement.text: Clean and gut the catfish. Make a cut on the belly and use your fingers to get the fish guts out. Give the inside a good rinse.
itemListElement.name: Clean and gut the catfish. Make a cut on the belly and use your fingers to get the fish guts out. Give the inside a good rinse.

itemListElement.text: Slice into segments. Lay the fish on a chopping board and cut it info even segments.
itemListElement.name: Slice into segments. Lay the fish on a chopping board and cut it info even segments.

itemListElement.text: Remove the slimy layer. Massage the pieces with 3 tablespoons of cornstarch and half a tablespoon of salt, making sure each piece is well-coated.
itemListElement.name: Remove the slimy layer. Massage the pieces with 3 tablespoons of cornstarch and half a tablespoon of salt, making sure each piece is well-coated.

itemListElement.text: Wash the pieces. Transfer the catfish to a bowl of cold water. Rub them and rinse under running water.
itemListElement.name: Wash the pieces. Transfer the catfish to a bowl of cold water. Rub them and rinse under running water.

itemListElement.text: Deep-fry. In a large pan, heat enough oil to submerge the fish pieces over medium-low heat. Once hot, deep-fry the catfish, flipping them occasionally.
itemListElement.name: Deep-fry. In a large pan, heat enough oil to submerge the fish pieces over medium-low heat. Once hot, deep-fry the catfish, flipping them occasionally.

itemListElement.text: Let excess oil leak. After approx 10 minutes, when the catfish turns golden with a crispy texture, remove from pan and transfer to a colander to let excess oil drip off.
itemListElement.name: Let excess oil leak. After approx 10 minutes, when the catfish turns golden with a crispy texture, remove from pan and transfer to a colander to let excess oil drip off.

itemListElement.text: Fry red curry paste. Heat oil in a large wok pan or skillet over medium heat. Toss in the red curry paste and stir it until aromatic or 10–20 seconds.
itemListElement.name: Fry red curry paste. Heat oil in a large wok pan or skillet over medium heat. Toss in the red curry paste and stir it until aromatic or 10–20 seconds.

itemListElement.text: Add flavors. Stir in water, palm sugar, fish sauce, chilies, and kaffir lime leaves.
itemListElement.name: Add flavors. Stir in water, palm sugar, fish sauce, chilies, and kaffir lime leaves.

itemListElement.text: Cook until sugar dissolves. Make sure all the seasonings are well mixed, and cook until the sugar dissolves.
itemListElement.name: Cook until sugar dissolves. Make sure all the seasonings are well mixed, and cook until the sugar dissolves.

itemListElement.text: Thoroughly coat each piece with spicy sauce and serve immediately.
itemListElement.name: Thoroughly coat each piece with spicy sauce and serve immediately.
